channel.title: Sweet Bot O' Mine on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sweet Bot O' Mine on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A DOGE AI Tool Called SweetREX Is Coming to Slash US Government Regulation
item.description: Named for its developer, an undergrad who took leave from UChicago to become a DOGE affiliate, a new AI tool automates the review of federal regulations and flags rules it thinks can be eliminated.
